text: fay dafae dafe hwla' alkafarat 'iilaa 'ana yasiruu nhwk -ayha alrswl- msreyn, waqad mddu 'aenaqihim 'iilayk mqblyn bi'absarihim elyk, ytjmewn ean yaminuk waean shmalk hlqana mutaeadidat wjmaeat mutafariqat yatahadathun wytejbwn? 'ayatmae kulu wahid min hwla' alkufaar 'ana yudkhilh allah janat alnaeim aldaym? lays al'amr kama ytmewn, fa'iinahum la yadkhulunaha abdana. 'inna khalaqnahum mimaa yaelamun min maa' mahin kghyrhm, falam ywmnu, faman 'ayn ytshrfwn bidukhul janat alneym?
